title: Nicola Sturgeon – 2021 Comments on Jayda Fransen
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Nicola Sturgeon, the Scottish First Minister, on 6 May 2021.
content:
Glasgow Southside is the most diverse and multi-cultural constituency in Scotland – one of the many things that makes it so brilliant. I am confident it will unite today to utterly reject these fascists.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
  *[ESA]: Employment and Support Allowance
  *[

 ]: special educational needs and/or disabilities
  *[SEND]: special educational needs and/or disabilities
